title: Cellular RF Transmitter Systems Engineer
summary: Imagine what you could do here! At Apple, we work every single day to craft products that enrich people’s lives. Join our dynamic group and contribute to upcoming products that will delight and encourage millions of Apple’s customers every day.
description: In this role, you will be part of a best-in-class cellular systems engineering team. You will define the architecture and implementation of cellular transmitters under real-life conditions and clear differentiation from other solutions.
key_qualifications: We would like you to have proven expertise and first-hand experience in architectures, concepts, design, and simulation of cellular transmitters. Your technical profile shall cover several of the following areas of knowledge and experience: Proven expertise in analyzing transmit chains, Solid knowledge of Cellular Radio/3GPP standards, Self-confident appearance and excellent communication skills.
education_experience: BS and a minimum of 3 years relevant industry experience
